rules_text:
[i]Native Faith[/i] – Whenever Suwako enters or attacks, create a black Aura Curse enchantment token named Mishaguji attached to target player. The token has enchant player and “At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted player loses 1 life.”
[i]Creation of Earth[/i] – {2}{G}, Discard a card: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
